definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Look, Mike. Here'rethe jade bracelets you want.
sentences.chinese: 麥克，你看，這兒有你要買的玉手鐲。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you show me the cloisonné bracelet in the counter?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，你能把櫃檯裏的那個景泰藍手鐲給我看看嗎？

sentences.english: Opt for stud earrings or single bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 選擇鑽石耳環或者單手鐲。

sentences.english: Ours is a well-known store and our goods are always dependable.
sentences.chinese: 這隻手鐲是敝店熱門貨之一。

sentences.english: A gold bracelet dangled from his left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 一隻金手鐲在他的左手腕上晃來晃去。

sentences.english: Once pairing is successful, bracelet is under stand-by mode.
sentences.chinese: 連接成功後，手鐲是在待機模式。

sentences.english: 19 the earrings and bracelets and veils
Religious jewellery such as rosary beads and bracelet makes for an interesting gift.
sentences.chinese: 念珠，手鐲等宗教首飾也是有趣的禮物。

sentences.english: The older man was buried with jade and amber collars and bracelets and pearl ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 年長的男子的殉葬品有玉器琥珀項圈手鐲，珍珠飾品。

sentences.english: Hanging from his right wrist is a heavy gold bracelet.
sentences.chinese: 他的右腕上戴着一隻沉甸甸的金手鐲。

sentences.english: I want to buy mom a silver bracelet for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我打算給我媽媽買一個銀手鐲作爲生日禮物。

sentences.english: Do not let your bracelets jingle when， lamp in hand， you lead him in.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓你的手鐲作響，當你提着燈，帶他進來的時候。

sentences.english: Well, I love your dressing style, especially your bracelet.
sentences.chinese: 還有，我很喜歡你的着裝風格，尤其是你的手鐲。

sentences.english: You could also wear jewellery such as wire bracelets and some dangling earrings.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以戴些像手鐲和晃晃蕩蕩的耳環之類的飾品。

sentences.english: His hair is tied in a topknot and He has earrings , bracelets and armlets.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮與頭飾連成一體，還有耳環，手鐲和臂環。

definition: brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
